title: Maintenance Work Order Prioritization
description: An O&M supervisor has a backlog of 50 open work orders across a wind portfolio and needs the agent to prioritize them based on urgency and economic impact.

tasks.description: For each work order, identify the affected asset and the nature of the fault.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a list of all open work orders and their associated issues.

tasks.description: Estimate the daily revenue loss associated with each fault (e.g., a full turbine outage vs. a minor sensor error).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assigns a daily financial impact to each work order.

tasks.description: Assign a safety and compliance risk score to each work order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent scores each task based on potential risks.

tasks.description: Generate a prioritized list of work orders, ranking them by a combined score of financial impact and risk.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a ranked list to guide the supervisor's daily planning.
